Introduction to statistical methods with R
================
This page contains teaching material for **introductory** courses of statistics in R.

------------------------------------------------------------------------


Courses
----

The links below lead to html notebooks. The slides are available upon request. The original **Rmd** files can be downloaded further hereafter.

1.  <a href="files/S1_tidyverse.nb.html" target="_blank">**Introduction to the tidyverse**</a>: plotting, filtering, organising data.

2.  <a href="files/S2_Basics.nb.html" target="_blank">**Basic R instructions**</a>: package installation, data generation, matrix & dataframe manipulation, loops and simple functions.

3.  <a href="files/S3_Distributions.nb.html" target="_blank">**Distributions**</a>: descriptive statistics, parametric distributions, plots, histograms, etc.

4.  <a href="files/S4_MLE.nb.html" target="_blank">**Maximum likelihood estimation**</a>: moment matching versus the mle/mle2 functions.

5.  <a href="files/S5_MC.nb.html" target="_blank">**Monte-Carlo simulations**</a>: random number generation with sequential tournaments as examples + cool exercises.

6.  <a href="files/S6_TS.nb.html" target="_blank">**Time-series analysis**</a>: fitting autoregressive processes & predictions using [French economic data](https://github.com/shokru/rstats/blob/master/data/economics.RData).

7.  <a href="files/S7_Bayes.nb.html" target="_blank">**Bayesian inference**</a>: conjugate priors, grid approximation and a snapshot of Markov Chains (but no MCMC sadly).

8.  <a href="files/S8_Test.nb.html" target="_blank">**Statistical tests & regressions**</a> : one and two mean tests, basic regression analysis.

<a href="files/R_Memo.nb.html" target="_blank">**R Memo**</a>: a compilation of everything you need to know (survival toolkit).

<a href="files/Fin_solutions.nb.html" target="_blank">**Example on financial data**</a>: exercises on 30 large US firms; data **[here](https://github.com/shokru/rstats/blob/master/data/data.RData)**.

<a href="https://gcoqueret.shinyapps.io/Tidyverse-exercises/" target="_blank">**Online tutorial**</a>: exercises & solutions on the core functions of the tidyverse.
